title: Robot Components: Intuitive Robot Programming for ABB Robots inside of Rhinoceros Grasshopper
description: Robot Components is a plugin for intuitive robot programming for ABB robots inside of Rhinoceros Grasshopper. Robot Components offers a wide set of tools to create tool paths, simulate robotic motion, and generate RAPID code within Grasshopper.
references: Brandstötter, M., Angerer, A. & Hofbaur, M. (2014). An Analytical Solution of the Inverse Kinematics Problem of Industrial Serial Manipulators with an Ortho-parallel Basis and a Spherical Wrist. In: Proceedings of the Austrian Robotics Workshop, Linz, Austria.
